name: Taskforce BPO
description: Taskforce BPO is an American Veteran owned company whose mission is to provide clients with labor solutions that enable them to focus on their core competencies while increasing productivity and profitability. They accomplish this goal by leveraging over 50 years of insurance and healthcare industry experience to provide Staff Augmentation and Project Management services that will lower your costs by up to 70% and increase your efficiency by 50%.

locations.address: Keops Complex, Bul. Vasko Karangelevski br. 31
